segments.text: I notice the warm light coming through the kitchen window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's concentrating on that dish towel and plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how absorbed she is in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh god, the water from the sink is flooding everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge, soaking the floor completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll be so upset when she sees the damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, a boy is precariously balanced on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the open cookie jar, looking triumphant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's watching eagerly, her little hand extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a mischievous moment, it's kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the stool is tilting, this could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside makes it all feel eerie.
segments.speaker: PAR
